name: Big Bang (Anciny, Eldstadur)
description:
Do you have what it takes to turn your little lumpy space rock into a big bright beautiful star in this space action game?

Game Jam Theme: At the beginning... There was nothing

This is an endless space game created for the Kindred Community Jam #6. You will move your space rock to avoid larger rocks while absorbing the smaller ones.

How to play

Your space rock is pulled towards your mouse, use this to avoid colliding with red rocks and at the same time eat the smaller green rocks!

Thanks to Eldstadur who helped me with some of the art!

Music and Sound

Music: Voxel Revolution by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7017-voxel-revolution License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Sound from: Mixkit https://mixkit.co/
